name: WeSplit
description: The WeSplit project addresses a common yet non‑trivial problem: managing shared expenses fairly and transparently within groups. By modelling users, groups, memberships, expenses, and settlements as first‑class entities, and by enforcing role‑based access control (RBAC) at the group level, the system provides a structured way to answer a simple question: “who owes whom, and how much?”. From a functional perspective, WeSplit allows users to create and join multiple groups, record expenses with flexible split methods, and capture settlements that gradually clear outstanding balances. The multi‑tenant design ensures that a single user can participate in several contexts—such as trips, households, or clubs—while holding different roles in each. This, combined with clear balance computation and history views, reduces the friction and ambiguity usually associated with reconciling shared costs.

name: Text Compression App
description: The Huffman Text Compression application implements a text compression and decompression system using Huffman coding in a modern React Native app. The Huffman algorithm provides a compact, prefix-free encoding of input characters based on frequency. By integrating this algorithm into an interactive mobile UI, the app allows users to see the entire compression process: from character frequencies and code generation to encoding, decoding, and ratio calculation. The decoded output always matches the original input, validating lossless compression. Using Expo’s cross-platform libraries simplified file saving and sharing on mobile devices.

name: Blog Site
description: Blog Site is an idea-sharing platform designed for new startups. Users can create an account using GitHub and pitch their startup ideas to others. They can also explore a timeline of pitches shared by other users and view the profiles of those who have submitted pitches. This project utilizes Static Site Generation (SSG) and Streaming Server Rendering (SSR) to enhance performance and user experience.
contribution: I build this project for practice purposes. I have learned Next/React on this project.

name: Infiny E-commerce
description: Infiny E-commerce is a single vendor serverless E-commerce Web Application. Build with React JS single page application technology (SPA) and Firebase Realtime Database.
contribution: I build this project for practice purposes. I have learned Firebase Real-Time Database on this project.

name: Darya.ai
description: Darya.ai is a US based messaging chatbot. The web app is for schedule meeting time according to user availability. Chatbot provide URL to it's user. User can come with URL provided by chatbot or can also login with google account to schedule their meeting time, also can update their schedule.
contribution: I build a meeting scheduling Web app for Darya.ai. I have learned the use of the Firebase Firestore database on this project.

name: Express Kitchens and Bath
description: Express Kitchens and Bath is a kitchen and bath remodeling company. They provide a wide range of services, including kitchen and bath remodeling, custom cabinetry, and countertop installation. The website showcases their services and portfolio, and allows users to request a free estimate.
contribution: I build the front-end of the website. I have learned the integration of Sanity CMS on this project.

name: CliqClose
description: cliQClose is a platform that connects buyers and sellers of real estate. The website allows users to search for properties, view listings, and connect with real estate agents. Users can also create an account to save their favorite listings and receive notifications about new properties that match their criteria.
contribution: I converted this from Bootstrap to Alpine.js with TailwindCSS.

name: Go Sourcer
description: Go Sourcer is a platform that connects buyers and sellers of real estate. The website allows users to search for properties, view listings, and connect with real estate agents. Users can also create an account to save their favorite listings and receive notifications about new properties that match their criteria.

name: X METAVERSE PRO

X METAVERSE PRO collaborates with global technology enthusiasts, financial experts, business elites, and Dao members to develop Metaverse Investment Bank, NFT Trading Market, Metaverse Mall, Alliance Reserve Bureau, Dex, GameFi, SocialFi, Metaverse City Cluster, and other ecological applications.

name: GVI
description: Global Village International (GVI) is one of the Bangladesh’s leading premium import, marketing and distribution company. Global Village International (GVI) has been successfully operating in the Bangladesh region with multiple concepts providing a selection of trusted brands to through all channels of distribution. Established in 1999, our history and wealth of knowledge and our experience of more than 2 decades help us to to provide our customers with best modernized and innovative service.

name: RMS
description: RMS (Result Management System) is a program that use to manage academic examination results. It's can calculate marks and generate the result by itself. And can publish the result to the students. After entering every subject’s mark admin can public the result page to the student and students can search their results by themself.
